title: How to Perform a Heel Raise

steps.headline: Step up on to a set of stair steps and hold onto the wall or stair railing.
steps.description: You can also use a sturdy chair.

steps.headline: Place the balls of your feet on the step and slowly let your heels sink down.
Raise your heels as high as you can.
Go down as low as you can.
Repeat at least 5 times to begin with, moving up to 10, 15, 20 over time.
steps.description: Repeated use of this exercise will strengthen your calf muscles and loosen tight foot muscles over time.
